attributes.background: No Longer should the British People be Forced into Paying For the Right to have a TV in there house - keep people like (in Some Cases) Pedophiles in the life of Luxury - Or be FORCED to pay for the Government Propaganda That forms opinion for us rather than having the Choice to Think for Ourselves.

rejection.details:
Sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163247
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
